nodes.text: The Mining Guild Freighter was a model of freighter that was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance and was used by the Mining Guild. Many of these starships joined the citizens' fleet that was assembled by General Lando Calrissian to aid the Resistance against the forces of the Sith Eternal during the Battle of Exegol.

It had a set of six engines, which were in two rows of three. It was also armed with at least two twin laser cannons at the bow, had a hyperdrive, and held cargo containers on the port and starboard. The frontal section was similar in physical appearance to the bow of a Consular-class space cruiser.

The Mining Guild Freighter was first seen in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker and identified as such in the clip "A Final Alliance" behind the scenes featurette that came with the Target exclusive of the home video.
